languages.text: У коменданта есть запрос на провизию — аванпост рискует скоро остаться без еды. Он умоляет вас о помощи, предлагая в обмен то немногое, чем обладает его поселение.

traits.locale_text: У коменданта есть запрос на провизию — аванпост рискует скоро остаться без еды. Он умоляет вас о помощи, предлагая в обмен то немногое, чем обладает его поселение.

languages.text: The outpost will soon run out of food at this rate, so the custodian sends an urgent request for provisions. He is begging you for help, offering what little his settlement has in exchange.
languages.original_text: У коменданта есть запрос на провизию — аванпост рискует скоро остаться без еды. Он умоляет вас о помощи, предлагая в обмен то немногое, чем обладает его поселение.

traits.locale_text: The custodian sends a request for resources the outpost desperately needs. He is begging you for help, offering what little his settlement has in exchange.
The custodian sends a request for resources the outpost desperately needs. He is begging you for help, offering what little his settlement has in exchange.
The outpost will soon run out of food at this rate, so the custodian sends an urgent request for provisions. He is begging you for help, offering what little his settlement has in exchange.
The outpost will soon run out of food at this rate, so the custodian sends an urgent request for provisions. He is begging you for help, offering what little his settlement has in exchange.
The outpost will soon run out of food at this rate, so the custodian sends an urgent request for provisions. He is begging you for help, offering what little his settlement has in exchange.

languages.text: Comme l'avant-poste sera bientôt à court de vivres, le gardien demande l'envoi de provisions de toute urgence. Il implore votre aide et offre en échange le peu dont dispose son installation.
languages.original_text: The outpost will soon run out of food at this rate, so the custodian sends an urgent request for provisions. He is begging you for help, offering what little his settlement has in exchange.

traits.locale_text: Comme l'avant-poste sera bientôt à court de vivres, le gardien demande l'envoi de provisions de toute urgence. Il implore votre aide et offre en échange le peu dont dispose son installation.

languages.text: このままでは前哨地の食料が間もなく底をついてしまうので、管理人は食料の緊急要請を送った。彼はあなたに助けを求め、その代わりに彼の集落にあるささやかなものを差し出している。
languages.original_text: The outpost will soon run out of food at this rate, so the custodian sends an urgent request for provisions. He is begging you for help, offering what little his settlement has in exchange.

traits.locale_text: このままでは前哨地の食料が間もなく底をついてしまうので、管理人は食料の緊急要請を送った。彼はあなたに助けを求め、その代わりに彼の集落にあるささやかなものを差し出している。

languages.text: 按照这个速度，哨站的食物很快就会耗尽。因此，看守人发出紧急请求，希望你能够提供食物。他在乞求你的帮助，愿意以殖民地所剩无几的财物作为交换。
languages.original_text: The outpost will soon run out of food at this rate, so the custodian sends an urgent request for provisions. He is begging you for help, offering what little his settlement has in exchange.

traits.locale_text: 按照这个速度，哨站的食物很快就会耗尽。因此，看守人发出紧急请求，希望你能够提供食物。他在乞求你的帮助，愿意以殖民地所剩无几的财物作为交换。

languages.text: El puesto avanzado a este ritmo se quedará pronto sin comida, por lo que el custodio envía una petición urgente de provisiones. Te suplica ayuda, ofreciendo a cambio lo poco con lo que cuenta su asentamiento.
languages.original_text: The outpost will soon run out of food at this rate, so the custodian sends an urgent request for provisions. He is begging you for help, offering what little his settlement has in exchange.

traits.locale_text: El puesto avanzado a este ritmo se quedará pronto sin comida, por lo que el custodio envía una petición urgente de provisiones. Te suplica ayuda, ofreciendo a cambio lo poco con lo que cuenta su asentamiento.

languages.text: Dem Außenposten werden bald die Lebensmittel ausgehen, wenn es so weitergeht. Der Verwalter bittet daher dringend darum, dass du ihm Vorräte lieferst. Er fleht dich förmlich um Hilfe an und bietet im Tausch das Wenige, was seine Siedlung entbehren kann.
languages.original_text: The outpost will soon run out of food at this rate, so the custodian sends an urgent request for provisions. He is begging you for help, offering what little his settlement has in exchange.

traits.locale_text: Dem Außenposten werden bald die Lebensmittel ausgehen, wenn es so weitergeht. Der Verwalter bittet daher dringend darum, dass du ihm Vorräte lieferst. Er fleht dich förmlich um Hilfe an und bietet im Tausch das Wenige, was seine Siedlung entbehren kann.

languages.text: Bu gidişle yakında karakolda yiyecek kalmayacak, o yüzden karakol sorumlusu acil erzak isteğinde bulunuyor. Senden yardım dileniyor, karşılığında da bu yerleşim yerinin varını yoğunu teklif ediyor.
languages.original_text: The outpost will soon run out of food at this rate, so the custodian sends an urgent request for provisions. He is begging you for help, offering what little his settlement has in exchange.
